Title: Requires health insurance policies and medicaid to cover biomarker testing for certain purposes
Summary: Requires health insurance policies and medicaid to cover biomarker testing for diagnosis, treatment, appropriate management, or ongoing monitoring of a covered person's disease or condition when the test is supported by medical and scientific evidence.
LawCode: Amd §§3216, 3221 & 4303, Ins L; amd §365-a, Soc Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the insurance law and the social services law, in relation to requiring health insurance policies and medicaid to cover biomarker testing for certain purposes
